thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 61 of 625
thread.title: Siera

author: Siera
title: Siera
text: Although the clothes look really nice and I am excited to recieve them I kept having problems at checkout. It would not let me use my normal school address so I had to change it to my home one. Then it kept telling me that I was outside of the contiguous United States and charged me an extra dollar for shipping, no matter what address I used. Very annoying and very tedious. If this happens next time I try to order I will not be continuing my membership.
